contentBlocks.title: General Ventilation Requirements
paragraphs: Ventilation systems must be energy efficient and meet minimum efficiency requirements.
Ventilation systems must be installed in accordance with manufacturer's instructions.
Ventilation systems must be accessible for maintenance and replacement.
Ventilation systems must be suitable for the intended use of the building.

contentBlocks.title: Energy Efficiency Requirements
paragraphs: Ventilation systems must meet minimum energy efficiency requirements as specified in the NCC.
Ventilation systems must be suitable for the intended use of the building.
Ventilation systems must be installed in accordance with manufacturer's instructions.
Ventilation systems must be accessible for maintenance and replacement.

contentBlocks.title: Installation Requirements
paragraphs: Ventilation systems must be installed in accordance with manufacturer's instructions.
Ventilation systems must be accessible for maintenance and replacement.
Ventilation systems must be suitable for the intended use of the building.
Ventilation systems must be installed by a qualified person.
